name: Kombi P1 Liner Glove - Men's
description: Slide these smooth-faced gloves under your outer shells for warm hands in the backcountry. They're fast to dry and offer protection from wind and wet when worn alone.Active-sport® shell (175g/sqm) is wind resistant, breathable and quick to dry.Lined in Accu-dri® moisture-wicking micro-polyesterTouchscreen compatible inserts on thumbs and forefingers.Contoured wrists slide under your jacket or outer gloves.
